verses.verse: "You shall not <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> an <S%H7794>ox<s%> or a <S%H7716>sheep<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1961>has<s%> a <S%H9249>blemish<s%> or <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H1697>defect,<s%> <S%H7451><s%> for that is a <S%H8441>detestable<s%> <S%H8441>thing<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H3588>"If<s%> there is <S%H4672>found<s%> in your <S%H7130>midst,<s%> in <S%H259>any<s%> of your <S%H8179>towns,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5414>giving<s%> you, a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H7451>what<s%> is <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> by <S%H5674>transgressing<s%> His <S%H1285>covenant,<s%>

and has <S%H1980>gone<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> them, or the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> the <S%H3394>moon<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavenly<s%> <S%H6635>host,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have not <S%H6680>commanded,<s%>

and if it is <S%H5046>told<s%> you and you have <S%H8085>heard<s%> of it, then you shall <S%H1875>inquire<s%> <S%H3190>thoroughly.<s%> And <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if it is <S%H571>true<s%> and the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H3559>certain<s%> that <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H8441>detestable<s%> <S%H8441>thing<s%> has been <S%H6213>done<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

then you shall <S%H3318>bring<s%> out that <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> that <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1697>deed,<s%> to your <S%H8179>gates,<s%> [that is,] the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> the <S%H802>woman,<s%> and you shall <S%H5619>stone<s%> them to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

"On the <S%H6310>evidence<s%> of <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5707>witnesses,<s%> he who is to <S%H4191>die<s%> shall be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death;<s%> he shall not be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death<s%> on the <S%H6310>evidence<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5707>witness.<s%>

"The <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> shall be <S%H7223>first<s%> against him to <S%H4191>put<s%> him to <S%H4191>death,<s%> and <S%H314>afterward<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%> So you shall <S%H1197>purge<s%> the <S%H9563>evil<s%> from your <S%H7130>midst.<s%>

<S%H3588>"If<s%> any <S%H1697>case<s%> is <S%H4480>too<s%> <S%H6381>difficult<s%> for you to <S%H4941>decide,<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> one kind of <S%H1818>homicide<s%> or <S%H1818>another,<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> one kind of <S%H1779>lawsuit<s%> or <S%H1779>another,<s%> and <S%H996>between<s%> one kind of <S%H5061>assault<s%> or <S%H5061>another,<s%> being <S%H1697>cases<s%> of <S%H7379>dispute<s%> in your <S%H8179>courts,<s%> then you shall <S%H6965>arise<s%> and <S%H5927>go<s%> up to the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H977>chooses.<s%>

"So you shall <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levitical<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> or the <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is [in office] in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> and you shall <S%H1875>inquire<s%> [of them,] and they will <S%H5046>declare<s%> to you the <S%H1697>verdict<s%> in the <S%H4941>case.<s%>

<S%H5921>"According<s%> to the <S%H6310>terms<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H3384>teach<s%> you, and <S%H5921>according<s%> to the <S%H4941>verdict<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H5046>tell<s%> you, you shall <S%H6213>do;<s%> you shall not <S%H5493>turn<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> from the <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H5046>declare<s%> to you, to the <S%H3225>right<s%> or the <S%H8040>left.<s%>

"And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H6213>acts<s%> <S%H2087>presumptuously<s%> by not <S%H8085>listening<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest<s%> who <S%H5975>stands<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> to <S%H8334>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H176>nor<s%> to the <S%H8199>judge,<s%> that <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H4191>die;<s%> thus you shall <S%H1197>purge<s%> the <S%H9563>evil<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
"Then <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> will <S%H8085>hear<s%> and be <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> and will not <S%H2102>act<s%> <S%H2102>presumptuously<s%> <S%H5750>again.<s%>

<S%H3588>"When<s%> you <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you, and you <S%H3423>possess<s%> it and <S%H3427>live<s%> in it, and you <S%H559>say,<s%> 'I will <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> me like <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are <S%H5439>around<s%> me,'

<S%H7534>"Moreover,<s%> he shall not <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%> for himself, <S%H3808>nor<s%> shall he cause the <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H5483>horses,<s%> since the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H559>said<s%> to you, 'You shall <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> that <S%H1870>way.<s%>'

<S%H3808>"Neither<s%> shall he <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> for himself, <S%H3808>lest<s%> his <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H5493>turn<s%> <S%H5493>away;<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> shall he <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H7235>increase<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%> for himself.

that his <S%H3824>heart<s%> may not be <S%H7311>lifted<s%> up <S%H4480>above<s%> his <S%H251>countrymen<s%> and that he may not <S%H5493>turn<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> from the <S%H4687>commandment,<s%> to the <S%H3225>right<s%> or the <S%H8040>left;<s%> in <S%H4616>order<s%> that he and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> may <S%H748>continue<s%> <S%H748>long<s%> <S%H3117><s%> in his <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
